that challenge,

it is essential that our

in energy technology, to

our best efforts at climate

2441.31.text:

2445.74.text: on the U.S. Department of Education Green Ribbon Schools,

2451.55.text:
and environmental literacy, and

by using -- by looking

I was in communication

2542.11.text:

2576.07.text:

2586.42.text:
At ACE, we're working on

2589.99.text:
Have the talk: it doesn't

2592.82.text:
what generation you're from,

And how we go about starting

2597.49.text:

2601.17.text:

the environment?

2605.17.text:
Not having the question be

2608.14.text:
a yes-or-no answer or that the
person listening may perceive it

2613.01.text:
So, just trying to learn

2616.28.text:
and what they initially know

That's one thing that
we're working on.

Any other thoughts on that?

and that truth force, right,

My own example, my father

What really moved me

and there was a piece on

2977.14.text:
was swimming, and he

2984.61.text:
This shouldn't be
happening," you know.

I can either sit there on the

2997.29.text:
You know this community thing,

I mean, if we can start doing

3006.47.text:
will grow large, that's

And I, you know,
it's going to be,

3018.65.text:
we want it to be here

Yeah, when I was a sophomore

in high school, I

3043.87.text:
